Comment: I just really sometimes can't believe how preposterously childish and naive so much of the voter base must be to even publish headlines like this.   Of course they deserve a serious response. This man staged a coup. Like five years ago. Of course he's not joking about being a forever dictator. He staged. A. Fucking. Coup.   He was very almost thrown in a small cell for the rest of his life until the American fucking people voted to make him above the law in the greatest failure of collective action the modern world has ever seen.  None of his jokes are jokes. A person in his position should not even be joking because it is egregiously irresponsible at best. But they aren't jokes, they are future intentions.
